titleStmt.title: A letter from a freeholder of Buckinghamshire, to a friend in London, concerning the election of the knights of the said county
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Samuel Johnson, author of Julian the Apostate. cf. NUC pre-1956, v. 282, p. 381.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
